tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hand_geometry_data (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hand_geometry_image BYTEA,
  access_permissions TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE employee_data (
  employee_id INT NOT NULL,
  hand_geometry_data BLOB NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (employee_id)
)

CREATE TABLE access_permissions (
  access_id INT NOT NULL,
  permission_level VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (access_id)
)

CREATE TABLE employee_access (
  employee_id INT NOT NULL,
  access_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employee_data(employee_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (access_id) REFERENCES access_permissions(access_id)
)

CREATE TABLE employee_roles (
  employee_id INT NOT NULL,
  role_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (employee_id, role_name)
)

CREATE TABLE employee_access (
    employee_id INT,
    permission_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY(employee_id, permission_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (permission_id) REFERENCES access_permissions(permission_id)
);
